title: i'm new to PBE community
body: Hello, I'm new to PBE community and very happy to be part of it. i got a quick question, I received an email yesterday that I got accepted and I can download the Alpha Client (and I did) but whenever I checked on my PBE status it says that my application is pending. Please advise. Thank you.

replies.body: Alpha Client and the PBE are different things. You don't need a PBE account to use the Alpha client because the Alpha client is for the Live servers, not the PBE server. You're clear to install the Alpha Client and log in with your live account to access it. Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok thank you so much, my last question is; does that mean that I am not officially a PBE member yet? :/

Correct. They're two different invite systems, and you've been accepted into Alpha Client but not quite PBE just yet. I hope you enjoy the shiny new client. I personally love it and cannot wait for the final version.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
Do not want to break your heart or anything, but yes you are not a member of the PBE yet.
